vulnerabilities.name: Local variable shadowing
vulnerabilities.description: Detection of shadowing using local variables.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Rename the local variables that shadow another component.

vulnerabilities.name: Uninitialized function pointers in constructors
vulnerabilities.description: solc versions 0.4.5-0.4.26 and 0.5.0-0.5.8 contain a compiler bug leading to unexpected behavior when calling uninitialized function pointers in constructors.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Initialize function pointers before calling. Avoid function pointers if possible.

vulnerabilities.name: Pre-declaration usage of local variables
vulnerabilities.description: Detects the possible usage of a variable before the declaration is stepped over (either because it is later declared, or declared in another scope).
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Move all variable declarations prior to any usage of the variable, and ensure that reaching a variable declaration does not depend on some conditional if it is used unconditionally.

vulnerabilities.name: Void constructor
vulnerabilities.description: Detect the call to a constructor that is not implemented.

vulnerabilities.name: Cyclomatic complexity
vulnerabilities.description: Detects functions with high (> 11) cyclomatic complexity.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Reduce cyclomatic complexity by splitting the function into several smaller subroutines.

vulnerabilities.name: Deprecated standards
vulnerabilities.description: Detect the usage of deprecated standards.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Replace all uses of deprecated symbols.

vulnerabilities.name: Unindexed ERC20 event parameters
vulnerabilities.description: Detects whether events defined by the ERC20 specification that should have some parameters as indexed are missing the indexed keyword.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Add the indexed keyword to event parameters that should include it, according to the ERC20 specification.

vulnerabilities.name: Local variable shadowing
vulnerabilities.description: Detection of shadowing using local variables.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Rename the local variables that shadow another component.

vulnerabilities.description: solc versions 0.4.5-0.4.26 and 0.5.0-0.5.8 contain a compiler bug leading to unexpected behavior when calling uninitialized function pointers in constructors.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Initialize function pointers before calling. Avoid function pointers if possible.
